channel.title: Duchess Lore Suggestion : Why Everyone Has To Suffer?
channel.description: Being the daughter of the royal King and sister of the Prince. Duchess was once a normal Princess. Sitting in the castle all day, doing unfunny royal stuff. Princess was not happy with her royal life.Her brother and dad killing people did not felt right for her. She knew she had to do something to stop this madness. Then one night the solution came right into her room, The Mastermind was the answer. Mastermind and Princess had a nice long chat that night, and Princess realised she found somebody that thinks just like her. This is how our Princess become a Duchess.

item.title: Duchess Lore Suggestion : Why Everyone Has To Suffer?
item.dc:creator: Sam17z
item.description:
RealJesusIsBlack:

This is how our Princess become a Duchess.

You need to expand this thought she does not have a talk with the mastermind and suddenly become princess. You need a smoother transition and depth into the conversion process. But the part about the father + brother killing people was not good for her sounded good

Read full topic
